#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<cctype>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>                        
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define f(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define Sd(a) scanf("%d",&a);
#define Ss(a) scanf("%s",&a);


inline int Factorial(int x)
{
  return (x == 1 ? x : x * Factorial(x - 1));
}


int main() {

	int t;
	Sd(t);
	
	while(t--)
	{   int cnt=0;
	vector<int>vv;
		f(i,0,11)
		{
			int r;
			
			Sd(r);
			vv.push_back(r);
		}
		int k;
		Sd(k);
		int sel=0;
		//sort(vv.end(),vv.begin());
		sort(vv.rbegin(),vv.rend());
		//f(i,0,vv.size()){cout<<vv[i]<<" ";}
		
		f(i,0,vv.size())
		{
			if(vv[i]==vv[k-1])
			{
				cnt++;
				if(i==k-1)sel=cnt;
			}
			//cout<<cnt<<" ";
			if(vv[i]<vv[k-1])break;
			
		}
	
		
		int prd=1;
		f(i,0,sel)
		{
			prd*=(cnt-i);
		}
		//cout<<prd<<"\n";
		sel = Factorial(sel);
		prd=prd/sel;
		cout<<prd<<"\n";
	}
	
	return 0;
}
